Definition: In this task you are given a tweet that contains some form of irony. You must classify the type of irony the tweet has. Situational irony happens when a situation fails to meet some expectations. Polarity irony happens when irony is achieved by inverting the intended sentence. There are other kinds of ironies that are neither polarity nor situational. Note that URLs in the text have been replaced with [Link].
